summary: The Nurse Corps Tax Parity Act of 2025 aims to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude certain Nurse Corps payments from gross income. Specifically, it modifies section 108(f) and section 117(c)(2) of the code regarding the tax treatment of these payments and qualified scholarships under the Public Health Service Act, including scholarship programs. The changes are effective for taxable years starting after the Act's enactment.
